author: Arab News
title: Saudi- Mobily develops operational plan to serve Haj pilgrims through 100 sales points
text:
(MENAFN - Arab News) Mobily has started its exclusive preparations to meet pilgrims' demand during this year's Haj. 
The company has drawn up a comprehensive and operational plan based on its accumulative experience of past years and accordingly it managed to attract the attention and admiration thanks to its huge and strong infrastructure and its closeness to pilgrims and its innovative services provided to them. 
Mobily is keen to be present in all places frequented by pilgrims whether through the main branches or through POS deployed in the holy sites and ports either land air sea and miqats. More than 100 sales points have been provided with special offers which allow pilgrims to communicate with their loved ones at competitive prices. 
Mobily has already announced the readiness of all offices allocated to inform and guide the pilgrims about all available services and products outlets in the airports timings mashaer places surrounding the central zone outlets providing full services to pilgrims and visitors such as Haj package 4G and 3G networks and mobile phone sales. The company is also distributing awareness brochures in multiple languages. 
Mobily's initiative comes to confirm the spirit of welcome that is one of the main characteristics of the Kingdom and to highlight the positive perception image. It is known that the Haj experience remains in memory. From this point this requires to highlight the image that goes with the values of the land of the two holy mosques.
